org.mini2Dx.core.screen

Interface GameScreen

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicGameScreen

    public interface GameScreen
    A common interface to game screen implementations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Returns the identifier of the screen
      void initialise(GameContainer gc)
      Initialises the game screen
      void interpolate(GameContainer gc, float alpha)
      Interpolate between the previous and current state
      void onPause()
      Called when the game window is no longer active or visible.
      void onResize(int width, int height)
      Called when the game window's dimensions changes.
      void onResume()
      Called when the game window becomes active or visible again

      Called after the transition in
      void postTransitionOut(Transition transitionOut)
      Called after the transition out

      void preTransitionOut(Transition transitionOut)

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        void initialise(GameContainer gc)
        Initialises the game screen
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer of the game

      • update

        void update(GameContainer gc,
            ScreenManager<? extends GameScreen> screenManager,
            float delta)
        Updates the game screen
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer of the game
        screenManager - The ScreenManager of the game
        delta - The time in seconds since the last update

      • interpolate

        void interpolate(GameContainer gc,
                 float alpha)
        Interpolate between the previous and current state
        Parameters:
        alpha - The interpolation alpha value

      • render

        void render(GameContainer gc,
            Graphics g)
        Renders the game screen
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer of the game
        g - The Graphics context available for rendering

      • onResize

        void onResize(int width,
              int height)
        Called when the game window's dimensions changes. On mobile devices this is called when the screen is rotated.
        Parameters:
        width - The new game window width
        height - The new game window height

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        Called when the game window is no longer active or visible. On

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        Called when the game window becomes active or visible again

      • preTransitionIn

        void preTransitionIn(Transition transitionIn)
        Called before the transition in
        Parameters:
        transitionIn - The Transition in to this screen

      • postTransitionIn

        void postTransitionIn(Transition transitionIn)
        Called after the transition in
        Parameters:
        transitionIn - The Transition in to this screen

      • preTransitionOut

        void preTransitionOut(Transition transitionOut)
        Called before the transition out
        Parameters:
        transitionOut - The Transition out from this screen

      • postTransitionOut

        void postTransitionOut(Transition transitionOut)
        Called after the transition out
        Parameters:
        transitionOut - The Transition out from this screen

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the identifier of the screen
        Returns:
        A unique identifier
